titleInfo.title: Church of the Lord Jesus Christ service, 1995 May 6

mods.abstract: Vieo recording of a service that opens with singing lead by Jamie Coots followed by serpant handing by Carl Porter, Bill Pelfrey, and Junior McCormick amidst dancing by Shade Miller and Billy Lemming among others. Handling is followed by testimony from Junior McCormick. Carl Porter and Billy Lemming drink strychnine after which congregants sing, dance, and lay hands on one another.

name.namePart: Hood, Ralph W. Williamson, W. Paul (William Paul)
